faqs.question: Is it safe to use this website?
faqs.answer: The website uses a valid MetaMask connection to the Ethereum network of your choice. The website is as safe as your device is.

faqs.question: How much does it cost?
faqs.answer: TokenMaker does not charge you for anything. You only pay the gas fees set by the Ethereum network when you deploy your contract.

faqs.question: Do you track me?
faqs.answer: We do not track anything you do on the website. Our servers only log your IP address and user agent for reliability purposes. These logs are deleted after 10 days.
